name: When I Was Younger Online Trivia | Celebrities Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: When I was younger and before I saw my silver lining, I was an assistant nurse at the children's camp my parents ran. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer Lawrence.

	Before Jennifer Lawrence fell up the steps of the Dolby Theater, while going to accept her first Oscar, she played a mascot on the USA series "Monk". Her first Oscar nomination in 2011 came from the independent movie, "Winter's Bone". In 2013, Jennifer Lawrence accepted her first Oscar for Best Actress in a Leading Role for "Silver Lining's Playbook".

questions.text: When I was younger and before I was super bad, I wanted to study sketch comedy like on "Saturday Night Live". Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Emma Stone.

	When Emma was fourteen, she moved to Los Angeles with her mother where she studied acting. Her first TV role was as Laurie Partridge in "The New Partridge Family". Emma's movie debut came in 2007 with "Superbad". She won her first acting award as best newcomer in the 2007 movie, "Superbad".

questions.text: When I was younger and before I was a mean girl, I worked holidays at McDonald's. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Rachel McAdams.

	Rachel McAdams was an ice skater who turned down pairs training for a life as an actor. Her first TV role was as Hannah Grant in "The Famous Jett Jackson". Her first movie role was as Sally Garfield in the 2003 movie, "My Name is Tanina". Her first acting award was a Gemini award for an episode of "Slings and Arrows".

questions.text: When I was younger, but much older than age seven, I wanted to be a journalist, until I quit two weeks before graduation to become an actor. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Brad Pitt.

	Brad Pitt was two weeks away from graduation with a major in journalism and a minor in advertising when he quit college and moved to Los Angeles to pursue acting. His first TV role was a boy named Chris on the NBC soap, "Another World" in 1987. He shared a producing Oscar with Steve McQueen for the 2014 movie, "12 Years A Slave".

questions.text: When I was younger and considered myself to be magic, I worked in Florida as a stripper. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Channing Tatum & Tatum.

	Channing Tatum was paid $400 for his role in a Ricky Martin music video, "She Bangs". His first TV role was at the age of 24 when he played Bob Davenport in "CSI: Miami". Channing's first acting award came in 2006 when he won a Teen Choice Award as best breakout male star for 2006's "She's the Man".

questions.text: When I was younger and before I needed help, I was offered a scholarship created by Robin Williams at his alma mater, Julliard. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Jessica Chastain.

	Jessica Chastain graduated from Julliard in 2003 with a Bachelor in Fine Arts degree in drama. Her first TV role was as a psychotic woman in "E.R.". Her first movie role was the title character Jolene from the E.L. Doctorow book, "Jolene: A Life". Jessica won a Golden Globe for her role as CIA analyst Maya in "Zero Dark Thirty".

questions.text: When I was younger and before I was a pretty woman, I wanted to be a veterinarian. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Julia Roberts.

	Julia Roberts left college before her graduation and moved to New York where she modeled with Click Modeling Agency. Julia's first TV role was in one episode of "Crime Story" opposite Dennis Farina. Her first movie role was the 1988 movie, "Satisfaction" with Justine Bateman and Liam Neeson. Julia Roberts won her first acting award in 1990 with "Steel Magnolias".

questions.text: When I was younger and before I was crazy and stupid, I wanted to be an action star like Sylvester Stallone. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Ryan Gosling.

	Ryan Gosling joined the Mickey Mouse Club when the new mouseketeers joined the club in 1993. Being a mouseketeer was his first acting job. His movie debut came in 2000 when he starred as a football player named Alan Bosley in "Remember the Titans". His first acting award came in 2001 when Ryan won a Golden Aries for best foreign actor in "The Believer".

questions.text: When I was younger and before I was modern woman, I studied dentistry. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Sofia Vergara.

	Sofia Vergara dropped out two semesters before graduation to become a model. Her first acting job was at seventeen years old when she starred in a Pepsi commercial in Colombia. Her first movie role came in 2003 as CiCi in "Chasing Papi". "Glamour" magazine gave Sofia her first award as best comedy actress in 2012.

questions.text: When I was younger and before my life turned scandalous, I studied anthropology and sociology in college. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Kerry Washington.

	Kerry Washington studied anthropology and sociology at George Washington University before becoming an actor. Her first acting job was a commercial that got her a SAG card. Her movie debut came in 2000 with "Our Song". Her first acting award was given to her in 2001 by the Teen Choice Awards for breakout performance in "Save the Last Dance".
